summary: This is an email forwarding a news article about a legal development requiring Jeffrey Epstein's estate to share private video recordings from his properties. The article appears to involve Epstein's attorney Darren Indyke.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.role: Deceased financier, subject of estate proceedings
persons.context: The document concerns his estate being required to share private video recordings from his properties.

persons.name: Darren Indyke
persons.context: The forwarded article link references him in the context of the legal proceedings about sharing Epstein's private videos.

connections.description: Indyke is identified as an attorney for Epstein's estate, representing his legal and financial interests after his death.

events.title: Legal Order for Estate to Share Videos
events.description: A legal development requiring Jeffrey Epstein's estate to share private video recordings made at his properties.

keyFacts: A legal order was issued requiring Jeffrey Epstein's estate to share private video recordings from his properties.
The news article forwarded in the email involves Epstein's attorney, Darren Indyke.
The email was sent on December 18, 2020, forwarding a link to an article on olcmagazine.com.
